name: Spherical Engineering
description:
Welcome to Spherical Engineering.
Drag and drop different machines to make the ball end up in the golden pipe.
If you dont know what a certain machine does, Press the yellow button while in the shop.
Clicking on one of the numberd buttons will show a preview of the machine that that number represents.
Press R to reset your level and space to start once you placed all the machines.
The last screenshot shows the application to press inside the ZIP file to start the game.
GL.
